negotiation_message: Alice said in round 1: Hi Oliver, it's nice to negotiate with you. To start off, I propose that I take the 2 hats and you can have the 1 book and 3 balls. I think this would be a fair split since there are more balls than hats. What do you think?
oliver replied in round 1: Yes. That would be ideal!

Alice said in round 2: Great, I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement so quickly! To confirm, I will take the 2 hats, and you will take the 1 book and 3 balls. Let's halt the negotiation here since we've agreed on how to split the items. It was a pleasure negotiating with you!
oliver replied in round 2: halt negotiation
